Text:
To the Thingy: Does OEM mean that this will work with no activation needed when installing into any brand laptop (e.g. Dell, HP, Toshiba, etc.) that has SLIC 2.1 BIOS?

In the past, I recall that each OEM brand (e.g. Dell) had a Win7 OEM disc that would not work with other OEM brands (e.g. HP), resulting in the popular 48-in-1 OEM releases. Maybe I am mistaken?

Thanks for your incredible posts. You are a god among men!
Thanks for the clarification and the awesome posts!
When you say "OEM Volume" does that mean it works with volume licenses? Does that mean it won't work with a non-volume OEM product key off my laptop's COA?
This is final version of SP1 or not?
Is the Geniune Windows need to download and install Internet Explorer 9 ?????????????????????

Thank you soooo much.  After double installing my windows XP I decided it would be easier to install windows 7.  Don't get to do this very often but I will let you know when I get it installed how it went.  Thanks again.
This is not streamable does that mean that I cannot download over the web with utorrent?  I cannot figure out how to install so I think I am missing some stuff.
